definition: capable of being perceived by the senses, a strong hard building material composed of sand and gravel and cement and water, to form into a solid mass
details:
adjective
- capable of being perceived by the senses
- formed by the coalescence of particles
noun
- a strong hard building material composed of sand and gravel and cement and water
verb
- to form into a solid mass
- to cover with cement
= example: to cover with cement
